document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">goes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">led </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">while </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">stayed. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Earth's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">trafficking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">frontier, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">moved, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">made. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Not that he goes we love him more
